Funda
I-Arithmetics
Suka
Izinketho
PHUMA
ISKRINI ESIGCWELE
Faka isicelo
Ukukhethwa kwezinga
Q1 Uyini u-5 + 3?
a) 8
b) 7
c) 6
d) 9
Ukuchazwa: Isengezo kufaka phakathi ukuhlanganisa izinombolo ezimbili noma ngaphezulu ukuthola inani. Ukuxazulula ama-5 + 3, ubala ama-5, bese ubala amanye ama-3, alingana nalokhu. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-8.
Q2 Uma unama-apula ama-4 futhi uthola amanye ama-2, unama-aphula amangaki?
a) 4
b) 5
c) 6
d) 7
Ukuchazwa: Ukuthola ukuthi mangaki ama-apula onawo ngokuphelele, ufaka inani lama-apula owaqala ngalo (4) kwinani lama-apula owathola (2). Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele ngu-6.
Q3 Yikuphi kokulandelayo okufana no-2 + 6?
a) 5 + 2
b) 6 + 3
c) 7 + 4
d) 4 + 4 
Ukuchazwa: 4 + 4 kuyafana no-2 + 6. Ukubala okuningi okungu-4 kusuka ku-4 kusinika lokho 8. Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanelekile ngu-D.
Q4 Uma unamaswidi angama-7 futhi udla 2 kubo, ukhiphi amaswidi amangaki?
a) 3
b) 4
c) 5
d) 6
Ukuchazwa: Uma udla okuthile, une-thile embalwa. Ngakho-ke, ukuthola ukuthi mangaki amaswidi oshiye, ukhipha inani lamaswidi adliwe (2) kusuka kwinani eliphelele lamaswidi (7). 7 - 2 Ulingana 5. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-5.
Q5 Yiliphi inani elilahlekile ku-equation: 9 + __ = 11?
a) 1
b) 2
c) 3
d) 4
Ukuchazwa: Ukuthola inombolo elahlekile, uthola ukuthi kungakanani okungu-11 kuvela ku-9. Ngakho-ke, inombolo elahlekile ngu-2, kusukela ku-2 ngaphezulu kuka-9.
Q6 Yini engu-9 - 3?
a) 3
b) 4
c) 5
d) 6
Ukuchazwa: Ukususa kuhilela ukuthatha inombolo eyodwa kwelinye. Ukuxazulula i-9 - 3, uqala ngo-9 futhi uthathe 3, kukushiye ngo-6. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-6.
Q7 Uma unamamabula ama-7 futhi unikeza ama-2, ushiye amamabula amangaki?
a) 3
b) 4
c) 5
d) 6
Ukuchazwa: Lapho unikeza okuthile, unento embalwa leyo nto. Ngakho-ke, ukuthola ukuthi mangaki amamabula owashiye, ukhipha inombolo enikezwe (2) kwinani eliphelele lezimabula (7). 7 - 2 Ulingana 5. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-5.
Q8 Yikuphi kokulandelayo okufana no-8 - 4?
a) 7 - 3
b) 6 - 2
c) 5 - 3
d) 8 - 2
Ukuchazwa: 7 - 3 kuyafana no-8 - 4. 8 Ukususa 4 kusinika 4, 7 Ukususa 3 nakho kusinika u-4, ngakho-ke impendulo efanelekile yi.
Q9 Uma kunezinyoni eziyi-10 esihlahleni futhi 3 zindiza, zingaki izinyoni ezisele esihlahleni?
a) 5
b) 6
c) 7
d) 8
Ukuchazwa: Lapho izinyoni zindiza zihamba, inani lezinyoni liyancipha. Ukuthola ukuthi zingaki izinyoni ezisele, ukhipha inombolo endiza eya kude (3) kusuka kunani lezinyoni (10). I-10 - 3 ilingana 7. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-7.
Q10 Yiliphi inani elilahlekile ku-equation: 6 - __ = 4?
a) 1
b) 2
c) 3
d) 4
Ukuchazwa: Ukuthola inombolo elahlekile, ukhipha umphumela owaziwayo kusuka kwinombolo yokuqala. Ngakho-ke, 6 - 4 Abalinganayo 2. Ngakho-ke, inombolo elahlekile ngu-2. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-2.
Q11 Yini i-4 x 3?
a) 6
b) 7
c) 10
d) 12
Ukuchazwa: Ukuphindaphinda kubandakanya ukungezwa okuphindaphindiwe. Ukuxazulula 4 X 3, ungezela ama-4 kathathu, 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 = 12. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-12.
Q12 Uma kukhona amapensela ama-5 ephaketheni ngalinye futhi kunamaphakethe ama-4, mangaki amapensela aphelele?
a) 20
b) 15
c) 36
d) 25
Ukuchazwa: Ukuthola ukuthi mangaki amapensela akhona, uphinda inani lamapensela ephakethe ngalinye (5) ngenombolo yamaphakethe (4). I-5 x 4 ilingana 20. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-20.
Q13 Yikuphi kokulandelayo okufana no-3 x 6?
a) 9 x 2
b) 12 x 3
c) 4 x 4
d) 7 x 2
Ukuchazwa: 3 Kuthunyelwe ngu-3 ngo-6 kusinika sona 18, 9 ukuphindaphikwa ngu-2 futhi kusinika lokho 18. Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele yi.
Q14 Uma kunabafundi abayi-8 emugqeni ngamunye futhi kunemigqa emi-3, bangaki abafundi abasekhona?
a) 16
b) 20
c) 24
d) 32
Ukuchazwa: Ukuthola ukuthi bangaki abafundi abakhona ngokuphelele, uphindaphinde inani labafundi emugqeni ngamunye (8) ngenombolo yemigqa (3). 8 x 3 Ulingana 24. Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele ngu-24.
Q15 Yiliphi inani elilahlekile ku-equation: 7 x __ = 21?
a) 4
b) 3
c) 2
d) 1
Ukuchazwa: Ukuthola inombolo elahlekile, uhlukanisa umphumela owaziwa ngenombolo yokuqala. Ngakho-ke, abangu-21 bahlukaniswe ngu-7 abalinganayo 3. Ngakho-ke, inombolo elahlekile ngu-3. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-3.
Q16 Yini engu-12 ehlukaniswe ngu-3?
a) 2
b) 3
c) 4
d) 6
Ukuchazwa: Ukwahlukana kungukusebenza okuphambene nokuphindaphindwa. Ukuxazulula u-12 ahlukaniswe ngu-3, ​​udinga ukuthola ukuthi mangaki amaqembu angu-3 akhona ngo-12. Kusukela 12 lingahlukaniswa ngamaqembu ama-4 ka-3. Ngakho-ke, impendulo ingu-4.
Q17 Uma kunamaswidi ayi-15 futhi kwabiwa ngokulinganayo phakathi kwabangani aba-5, umngani ngamunye athola mangaki?
a) 2
b) 3
c) 4
d) 5
Ukuchazwa: Division imayelana nokwabelana ngokulinganayo. Ukuthola ukuthi mangakhi amaswidi umngani ngamunye, uhlukanisa inani eliphelele lamaswidi (15) ngenani labangane (5). Ihlukaniswe abangu-5 abalinganayo 3. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-3.
Q18 Yikuphi kokulandelayo okufana no-20 ahlukaniswe ngo-4?
a) I-100 ihlukaniswe ngama-25
b) Ama-50 ahlukaniswe ngu-10
c) 6 ehlukaniswe ngu-3
d) 7 Ihlukaniswe ngo-1
Ukuchazwa: Ukuhlukaniswa kuphambene nokuphindaphindwa. Ngakho-ke, ukuthola ukuthi yini 20 ehlukaniswe ngu-4 ilingana, ungacabanga ngamaqembu ama-4 angena ku-20. Ngakho-ke, umphumela ungo-5, 50 uhlukaniswe ngu-10 usinika i-5. Ngakho-ke, impendulo ingu-B
Q19 Uma kukhona ama-apula angama-24 bese abekwe kumabhasikidi ayi-6 ngokulinganayo, mangaki ama-aphula kubhasikidi ngamunye?
a) 2
b) 4
c) 6
d) 8
Ukuchazwa: Division imayelana nokwabelana ngokulinganayo. Ukuthola ukuthi mangakhi ama-aphula akhona kubhasikidi ngamunye, uhlukanisa inani eliphelele lama-apula (24) ngenombolo yamabhasikidi (6). I-24 ihlukaniswe ngu-6 ilingana 4. Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele ngu-4.
Q20 Yiliphi inombolo elahlekile ku-equation: 15 ihlukaniswe ngu -__ = 3?
a) 2
b) 3
c) 4
d) 5
Ukuchazwa: Ukuthola inombolo elahlekile, uhlukanisa umphumela owaziwayo ngempendulo. Ngakho-ke, abangu-15 bahlukaniswe ngabalingani abathathu abalinganayo. Ngakho-ke, inombolo elahlekile yi-5. Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiyo ingu-5.
Uqedile wonke amazinga
Weqa izinga (s)
Ukuqonda izibalo: isipiliyoni esisebenzayo
Izibalo zokubonisa ukuma kwendaba
Izimpendulo Ezilungile:
Izimpendulo ezingalungile:
Ukunemba kwakho
Umphumela wakho
